skills.name: League of Draven
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Innate:}} {{ci|Draven}} gains an ''Adoration'' stack when he catches a {{ai|Spinning Axe|Draven}} or kills a minion, monster, or tower. He loses ''Adoration'' stacks when he {{tip|death|dies}}.
When '''Draven''' kills an enemy {{tip|champion}}, he consumes all ''Adoration'' stacks to gain {{g|'''bonus''' gold}}.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} When '''Draven''' catches a {{ai|Spinning Axe|Draven}}, kills a non-champion, or destroys a {{tip|turret}}, he gains a stack of ''Adoration''.

In addition, killing a {{tip|minion}} or destroying a {{tip|ward}} or {{tip|stealthed trap|trap}} grants a ''{{ai|Strike}}'' stack for 10 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. If he drops an {{ai|Spinning Axe||axe}} or a nearby {{tip|minion}} dies without '''Draven''' killing it he loses all ''Strike'' stacks. At 6 stacks, he consumes all of his ''Strike'' stacks and gains 2 ''Adoration'' stacks.
When '''Draven''' [[kill]]s an enemy {{tip|champion}}, he consumes all of his ''Adoration'' stacks and gains {{g|25 + (2{{times}}stacks) '''bonus''' gold}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: When Draven catches a Draven's Spinning Axe, kills a non-champion, or destroys a turret, he gains a stack of Adoration.
In addition, killing a minion or destroying a ward or trap grants a undefined's Strike stack for 10 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. If he drops an 's axe or a nearby minion dies without Draven killing it he loses all Strike stacks. At 6 stacks, he consumes all of his Strike stacks and gains 2 Adoration stacks.
When Draven kills an enemy champion, he consumes all of his Adoration stacks and gains 25 + (2×stacks) bonus gold.
Draven loses 75% of his Adoration stacks upon death.
skills.notes:
* [[Assist]]s from {{ai|Death from Below|Pyke}} will trigger ''League of Draven''.
* Upon reaching 150 ''Adoration'' stacks, and every 100 stacks thereafter, as well as when he cashes at least 150 stacks in, '''Draven''' automatically sends a chat message notifying his team.
* A chat message will display to all players whenever:
** ''League of Draven'' grants over {{g|300 gold}}.
** ''League of Draven'' gets reduced.
* None of the parts of ''League of Draven'' require actually using a {{ai|Spinning Axe|Draven}} for a kill to get ''Strike'' or ''Adoration'' stacks, as well as to cash ''Adoration'' stacks.

skills.name: Spinning Axe
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Draven|Draven's}} next basic attack will throw an axe, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If '''Draven''' catches it, he automatically readies another ''Spinning Axe''. '''Draven''' can have two ''Spinning Axes'' at once.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Draven''' starts spinning his axe, causing his next [[basic attack]] within {{fd|5.8}} seconds to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.

The ''axe'' ricochets off the target high up into the air, landing 2 seconds later at a location determined by '''Draven's''' current movement. If '''Draven''' catches an axe, ''Spinning Axe'' is reapplied for no additional cost on his next basic attack.
'''Draven''' can hold up to two ''Spinning Axes'' in his hands at once.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Draven starts spinning his axe, causing his next basic attack within 5.8 seconds to deal bonus physical damage.
The axe ricochets off the target high up into the air, landing 2 seconds later at a location determined by Draven's current movement. If Draven catches an axe, Spinning Axe is reapplied for no additional cost on his next basic attack.
Draven can hold up to two Spinning Axes in his hands at once.
skills.notes:
* The landing location is determined by '''Draven's''' [[movement speed]] and direction at the time ''Spinning Axe'' hits the target. If '''Draven''' is actually moving, it will bounce directly into his path. Otherwise, it will bounce back towards his current location, either landing directly onto him or to his sides.
* ''Spinning Axe'' will place a visual cue on the ground where it will land. This visual cue is visible to both teams, although '''Draven''' himself will see a more prominent marker.
* Recasting ''Spinning Axe'' will refresh the [[buff]] and add another axe if possible.
** There is no limit to how many axes can be juggled at once, just the limit of 2 of them at a time in '''Draven's''' hands.
* '''Draven''' can catch (steal) an enemy's axes. This event also prompts one of a few unique voice lines.
* ''Spinning Axes'' may optically bypass {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} but they will be destroyed upon collision. {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} will not prevent the axe from bouncing off when {{ci|Braum}} is the target.
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} will not prevent the axe from bouncing off when {{ci|Braum}} is not the target.
* Attacks against structures will only refresh the timer on-attack.
* The axe will still bounce against parrying effects.
* {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} does not interact with the effects of the axes.
* If a ''Spinning Axe'' is readied during a basic attack wind-up, the effects will be applied to the fired attack.
* ''Spinning Axe'' attacks deal their total increased damage in a single instance of {{tip|basic damage}}.

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

skills.name: Blood Rush
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Draven}} gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and a burst of {{as|{{sti|movement speed}}}}. Whenever a {{ai|Spinning Axe|Draven}} is caught, ''Blood Rush's'' cooldown will {{sti|ah|reset}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Draven''' enters an adrenaline rush, gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds that decays over the duration, and {{tip|ghosting}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Draven enters an adrenaline rush, gaining bonus attack speed for 3 seconds, bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds that decays over the duration, and ghosting for 1.5 seconds.
Catching a Draven's Spinning Axe resets Blood Rush's cooldown.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 40}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|50 to 70}}%}}
skills.notes: * Activating ''Blood Rush'' while the effect is already active will refresh the duration.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

skills.name: Stand Aside
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Draven}} throws a fan of axes in a line in the target direction that deal {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, {{tip|airborne|knocking them aside}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Draven''' throws a fan of axes in a line in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, {{tip|airborne|knocking them aside}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Draven throws a fan of axes in a line in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, knocking them aside and slowing them for 2 seconds.
skills.notes: * ''Stand Aside'' will cast from wherever '''Draven''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD)
  • Slow: %

skills.name: Whirling Death
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Draven}} hurls forth two massive axes that deal {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit.
''Whirling Death'' can be recast while the axes are active, and does so automatically upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} or the edge of the map.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Draven''' hurls two massive axes in the target direction, briefly {{tip|sight|revealing}} the area along their path and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit. ''Whirling Death'' can be recast after 1 second while the axes are traveling, and does so automatically after the axes hit an enemy {{tip|champion}} or the edge of the [[Map (League of Legends)|map]].
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Draven''' reverses the direction of the axes, causing them to slowly come to a stop before homing back to him, dealing the same damage to enemies hit along the way back.
''Whirling Death'' deals {{pp|type=enemies hit|key=%|100 to 44 for 8;40|0 to 8|formula=100% - (8% per enemy hit). ''This is capped at 40% damage.''}} damage, resetting upon reversing direction.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Draven hurls two massive axes in the target direction, briefly revealing the area along their path and dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Whirling Death can be recast after 1 second while the axes are traveling, and does so automatically after the axes hit an enemy champion or the edge of the Map (League of Legends).
Recast: Draven reverses the direction of the axes, causing them to slowly come to a stop before homing back to him, dealing the same damage to enemies hit along the way back.
Whirling Death deals 0 to 8 ‒ undefined damage, resetting upon reversing direction.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|175 to 375}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110 to 150}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|175*2 to 375*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110*2 to 150*2}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* If '''Draven''' [[death|dies]] while the axes are cast, they will immediately fizzle.
* The minimap icon of ''Whirling Death'' can be seen by '''Draven''' and all his allies.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block one instance of damage.
* ''Whirling Death'' will cast from wherever '''Draven''' is at the end of the cast time.
